channel.title: How do i change the Client background image
channel.description: So when i run my client it has the person who made the client's picture. I want to change it to mine how do i do that?

item.title: How do i change the Client background image
item.dc:creator: @mlgsnipe mlgsnipe
item.description:
@mlgsnipe wrote:

Well if ur talking about changing an image for a 508 than i have no clue.
But for a 317 it is really really simple. this is how u do it:
open your “client files”
Go to the folder which says “files” click on it.
Next find “sprites”
then keep going down until u find the background image, open it up with paint,photoshop or whatever thing u use.
edit, copy, paste… whatever.
Save and exit.
Complile and ur done.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the Client background image
